name: Arch Insurance (EU) dac
goal:
Arch Insurance (EU) dac provides credit risk protection on residential mortgage loans in Europe.
We have an experienced team with strong underwriting capability, an execution track record and a focus on efficient transaction implementation. Arch invests in building long term relationships and providing outstanding customer service backed by our financial strength.
We deliver primary mortgage insurance on new originations through a policy that meets or exceeds the criteria of local supervisor requirements.
We deliver credit risk protection on portfolios of mortgages through a contract which is structured to meet the client’s objectives. Based on Arch’s structured solutions, our clients have satisfied the regulatory requirements for Significant Risk Transfer and hence obtained capital relief.
euInitiatives: Solvency II and all mortgage specific regulation, policies and initiatives with particular attention to insurance and bank solvency and capital requirements
